content.heading: Our Services
content.subheading: Complete lumber and milling solutions for your project

items.title: Dimensional Lumber
items.description: Standard dimensional lumber in all common sizes: 2x4, 2x6, 2x8, 2x10, 2x12, 4x4, 6x6, and more. Available in various lengths and grades.

items.title: Custom Milling & Cutting
items.description: Precision cutting services to meet your exact specifications. Whether you need beams, posts, or specialty dimensions, we can mill it.

items.title: Animal Bedding Shavings
items.description: Premium wood shavings for horses, livestock, and poultry. Clean, dust-free, and highly absorbent.

items.title: Delivery Services
items.description: We deliver throughout the Front Range region. Same-day and next-day options available for most orders.

items.title: Fencing Materials
items.description: Complete fencing supplies including posts, rails, boards, and hardware for agricultural and residential use.

items.title: Specialty Products
items.description: Beams, barn wood, siding, and other specialty lumber products. Contact us for availability and custom orders.

pages.title: FAQ - Fort Lupton Lumber Mill
pages.metaDescription: Frequently asked questions about lumber products, shavings, delivery, and services from Fort Lupton Lumber Mill.

content.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
content.subheading: Everything you need to know about our products and services

items.question: What types of wood shavings do you offer?
items.answer: We offer kiln-dried pine shavings in small bags, large bags, and bulk delivery. All shavings are clean, dust-free, and ideal for horse stalls, livestock bedding, and poultry coops.

items.question: How much area does one bag of shavings cover?
items.answer: A small bag (2.8 cu ft) covers approximately one standard horse stall at 3-4 inches deep. A large bag (5.5 cu ft) covers roughly two stalls.

items.question: Do you deliver?
items.answer: Yes! We deliver throughout the Front Range region. Same-day and next-day delivery options are available for most orders. Delivery fees vary by distance.

items.question: Can I pick up my order?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer will-call pickup at our Fort Lupton facility. Please call ahead to ensure your order is ready.

items.question: Do you cut lumber to custom sizes?
items.answer: Yes, we provide custom milling and cutting services. Bring us your specifications and we'll cut to your exact dimensions.

items.question: What are your hours of operation?
Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
items.answer: Yes, volume discounts are available for large orders of lumber and shavings. Contact us for a quote.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash, checks, and all major credit cards. Commercial accounts available for qualifying businesses.
